Posts.Content: kim2 wrote: My mom was dx w/ grade 2 IDC last week 8/22 we went to her surgeon today, I had my list of questiond ready to ask and I didn't even get a chance to see him. He told mom that he will answer all our questions after she has additional testing done that right now he really has no anwers, I can respect that but he now wants a ton of cxr, mri's, ct's and bone scans done right away and told her she will probably be having a mastecomy and she might want to consider bi-lat. Gave her the name of an oncologist "HE" wants her to see and made an appointment. Is this the "normal" way this works? We/I have never delt w/this it's all new and I want answers....Do I need to calm down and wait for answers? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scared & waiting kim2 Bren-2007
